document_data.name: Quimby
document_data.mainbody: '''Quimby''' was the owner of the [[Snowdrift Inn]] in [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: He was a large man who wore a brown outfit.
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Quimby provided room and board for the [[elven]] adventurer [[Erevain Blacksheaf]], before [[Hrothgar]] lead his expedition to [[Kuldahar]].
